summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Cookie Consent Banner and new Legal Policy pages. All 14 features tested successfully. Cookie Banner works correctly with Accept/Reject/Preferences buttons, localStorage persistence, and Privacy Policy link navigation. All 3 new legal pages (Risk Shield, Chargeback Defense, Elite Return Policy) display correctly with proper content. Legal Hub shows all 9 policy cards. Footer has new 'Policies' column with correct links.
critical_code_review_comments: CookieConsentBanner.jsx: Well-implemented with proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Cookie consent uses localStorage key 'afrovending_cookie_consent' with proper JSON structure including timestamp
Banner appears after 1 second delay (UX friendly)
Toggle switches properly toggle state and visual appearance
All 3 new legal pages have consistent styling with gradient headers and proper section structure
Footer correctly displays both 'Legal' and 'Policies' columns with all required links
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cookie consent banner and legal pages fully tested. localStorage key: 'afrovending_cookie_consent'. data-testid attributes: cookie-consent-banner, cookie-accept-btn, cookie-reject-btn, cookie-preferences-btn, save-preferences-btn, toggle-analytics, toggle-marketing, toggle-personalization. Legal pages routes: /legal, /legal/risk-shield, /legal/chargeback-defense, /legal/return-policy. Footer has 'Legal' and 'Policies' columns with all policy links.
